title: Growing Up
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Today is Children’s Day, huh~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Yeah, it is. I hope you grow up big and strong, Chika-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>You too, Karin-san! Let’s grow up big and strong!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Hehe, I’ll do my best.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Hey, hey, wanna go buy some kashiwa mochi at Honoka-chan's place?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Sounds good. The weather’s nice too, let’s go for a walk.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I’m all for it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Maybe we should buy some for everyone in Nijigaku too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>In that case, I’ll buy some for everyone in Aqours as well!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Everyone will have a great Children’s Day after having them 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
